descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see....two rectangle that are different colors
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... stays the same to make the output you have to copy the grid you need to connect each rectangle with a light blue straight line
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...connect the shapes with a light blue block

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...2 shapes of the different colors
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same size as the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...color a light blue bridge between the two shapes. Do not connect the bridge between from the outside 2 squares of the smaller shape.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...see two sets of blocks in different colors.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should remain the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...connect the two sets of blocks using light blue blocks leave the connection one width smaller than the smaller set of blocks.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... two rectangles that are different colors. One should be smaller than the other.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stays the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... Copy the grid. You need to connect each rectangle with a light blue straight line. The thickness of the line depends on the smaller rectangle. the light blue line should be 1 row/column less on each side than the smaller rectangle. you  are done.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...2 shapes on a black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...connect the shapes with a light blue block. The new connecting block is smaller than the smaller of the input blocks. Remove 1 rows of light blue squares from each side that is 90 degrees from the input squares.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... two different color shapes with some space between them.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy the input grid and connect the two shapes with the blue grid.it must be smaller than the size of the small input shape.
